name: The jam ends in 1 second
description:
This game tells a story of being under time pressure to make a game for a game jam. Wait...

Somehow this idea got into my head when I found out the theme, so the game is about literally making a game from nothing. Like in a game jam.

What makes this even more twisted is that this is also my first game jam, so it was a very two-way experience for me, and often how I felt inspired how I want the player to feel in this game.

Thank you for checking this out, let me know what I could've done better, and see you on the next jam :)
